sentences.en: A fuzzy adaptive control method is proposed for a flexible robot manipulator.
sentences.cn: 摘要提出了一种用于柔性机器人操作臂控制的模糊自适应控制策略.

sentences.en: A wavelet based adaptive regularization scheme for blind image restoration is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种将小波变换和自适应正则化方法相结合的盲图像复原算法.

sentences.en: Adaptive strategies may often evolve, such as the biochemical polymorphisms of blood and serum groups.
sentences.cn: 适应策略也常常进化, 例如:血型和血清的生化多形现象就是这样的.

sentences.en: Applied the markov process in the Structure Adaptive Control method.
sentences.cn: 将马尔科夫过程应用于结构自适应控制方法中.

sentences.en: Autophagy is an adaptive response of cells to physiological and pathological conditions.
sentences.cn: 自噬是一种在正常细胞和病态细胞中普遍存在的生理机制.

sentences.en: Conclusion Adaptive canceling methods can be applied to clinic treatment.
sentences.cn: 结论经完善,自适应抵消这一技术可以应用于超声热疗的临床中.

sentences.en: In an adaptive environment , however, deviations guide us towards the correct solution.
sentences.cn: 但是,在适应性环境中, 背离引导我们走向正确的答案.

sentences.en: It can serve as a base for self - protective and self - adaptive system.
sentences.cn: 该元件的提出为自保护、自适应分析体系的建立打下了基础.

sentences.en: Living in the oceans presented the sea snake with a host of tricky adaptive challenges.
sentences.cn: 海洋生活给了海蛇很多机警的适应性的挑战.

sentences.en: Main work include : 1 A method of adaptive DBF in received antenna array.
sentences.cn: 1讨论了在接收阵列天线中,自适应数字波束形成(DBF)的方法,引入了 采样 梯度矩阵算法.

sentences.en: Noise suppressing based on PDEs is an adaptive method.
sentences.cn: 基于偏微分方程的噪声抑制技术是一种自适应的技术.

sentences.en: Simplified hough transformation ( HT ) and adaptive including box method ( AIB ) approach are proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了简化的霍夫变换HT ( Hough　 Transform ) 方法和适应性包容盒AIB ( Adaptive　Including　Box ) 原理.

sentences.en: Societies need to develop highly adaptive behavioural rules for survival.
sentences.cn: 社会要生存需要建立有高度适应性的行为准则。

sentences.en: The paper presents a novel nonlinear adaptive optimal excitation controller.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种非线性自适应最优励磁控制器.

sentences.en: The proposed method is adaptive to other concurrent engineering fields.
sentences.cn: 该方法对于其他并行工程应用领域同样适用.

sentences.en: This paper presents an adaptive search mechanism for mobile P 2 P networks.
sentences.cn: 给出一种移动P2P网络中的自适应搜索机制.

words.tran_cn: 适合的；能适应的；可修改的
适应；改编；改编本，改写本
适配器；改编者；接合器；适应者
[通信] 适配器；（美）改编者；转接器（等于adapter）

phrases.tran_cn: 自适应控制，适应性控制；自适控制
自适应控制系统；适应式控制系统
自适应均衡；[电]配接等化；均一化调整
适应性免疫；获得性免疫；继承性免疫
自适应光学；适应性光学仪器（天文学使用的镜子，其形状可以改变以补偿光线受大气之扭曲）
适应辐射，适应性扩张；趋异

trans.tran_en: Adaptive means having the ability or tendency to adapt to different situations
